scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack:linux && npm run pack:linux64 && npm run pack:win && npm run pack:win64
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager . "Leike" --out=builds/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.36.1 --icon=app/img/icon.ico --version-string.CompanyName="Ikuturso" --version-string.FileDescription="Leike" --version-string.ProductName="Leike" --version-string.OriginalFilename="Leike" --version-string.LegalCopyright="(c) Ville Talonpoika 2015" --ignore=builds --ignore=src --ignore=scss
scripts.pack:win64: npm run clean:win64 && electron-packager . "Leike" --out=builds/win64 --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=0.36.1 --icon=app/img/icon.ico --version-string.CompanyName="Ikuturso" --version-string.FileDescription="Leike" --version-string.ProductName="Leike" --version-string.OriginalFilename="Leike" --version-string.LegalCopyright="(c) Ville Talonpoika 2015" --ignore=builds --ignore=src --ignore=scss
